mapper.select: select max(style_no) from t_style_color where style_no like concat(#{styleNo}, '%')
SELECT ssc.style_no, sd.brand, sd.brand_name, sd.year, sd.year_name, sd.season, sd.season_name FROM t_style_color ssc LEFT JOIN t_style sd on ssc.style_id = sd.id where ssc.id = #{styleColorId}

select ts.task_level, ts.task_level_name, ts.style_type, ts.style_type_name, ts.devt_type, ts.devt_type_name, ts.size_range, ts.size_range_name, ts.merch_design_name, ts.pattern_design_name, ts.style_pic, ts.design_no, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.his_design_no, ts.style_name, ts.style_flavour_name, ts.designer_id, ts.designer, ts.technician_id, ts.technician_name, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.year, ts.year_name, ts.season, ts.season_name, ts.prod_category2nd_name, ts.prod_category2nd, ts.prod_category3rd as prodCategory3nd, ts.prod_category3rd_name as prodCategory3ndName, ts.id styleId, tsc.*, tpi.id packInfoId, tsp.control_confirm, tsp.product_hangtag_confirm, tsp.control_hangtag_confirm, tht.technologist_name FROM t_style ts LEFT JOIN t_style_color tsc ON (ts.id = tsc.style_id AND tsc.del_flag = '0') LEFT JOIN t_pack_info tpi on tpi.style_no = tsc.style_no LEFT JOIN t_style_pricing tsp on tsp.pack_id = tpi.id left join t_hang_tag tht on tsc.style_no = tht.bulk_style_no ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select tsc.*, tpi.id packInfoId, ts.task_level, ts.task_level_name, ts.style_type, ts.style_type_name, ts.devt_type, ts.devt_type_name, ts.size_range, ts.size_range_name, ts.merch_design_name, ts.pattern_design_name, ts.id styleId, ts.style_pic, ts.design_no, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.his_design_no, ts.style_name, ts.style_flavour_name, ts.designer_id, ts.designer, ts.technician_id, ts.technician_name, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.year, ts.year_name, ts.season, ts.season_name, ts.prod_category2nd_name, ts.prod_category2nd, ts.prod_category3rd, ts.prod_category3rd_name, tsp.control_confirm, tsp.product_hangtag_confirm, tsp.control_hangtag_confirm FROM t_style_color tsc LEFT JOIN t_style ts ON ts.id = tsc.style_id LEFT JOIN t_pack_info tpi on tpi.style_no = tsc.style_no LEFT JOIN t_style_pricing tsp on tsp.pack_id = tpi.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
